title: Rising Tides / Crashing Skies
description: Blogger Ronaldo Fryman investigates Steven and the Crystal Gems to determine if they are safe for Beach City.
quote: This is a matter of weird and death!
studio: Studio Fryman, Keep Beach City Weird
altHero: Ronaldo Fryman in a blazer, on a chair, between two ferns
alt1: actual footage: a glowing pointing hand in the sky
alt2: two teen Black girls, chyron says “Jenny, intimidating teenage girl”
alt3: Ronaldo talking to Steven Universe at his front door
alt4: Ronaldo with the Crystal Gems on the beach at night
